description:
A protective sun shirt disguised as a loose-fitting T. It dries quickly, feels airy and gives you a UV blocking layer that won't wear off as you move.

  • Nylon elastane fabric blend is tough, stretchy and quick-drying
  • Loose fit gives you room to move
  • UPF 50+ sun protection
name: Level Six Bodhi Short Sleeve Sun Guard - Boys' - Youths
